wikipedia_page.main: Alistair John (born 28 November 1987) is a professional footballer who plays as a midfielder or forward. His most recent club was the Combined Counties League team Chessington & Hook United.

link_mentions.page: Charlton Athletic F.C. Under-23s and Academy

response: * 2 April: Loanees Alistair John, Dean Oliver and Simon Rayner extend their loan stays until the end of the season
* 12 April: Loanees Alistair John and Lloyd Kerry return to Charlton Athletic and Sheffield United respectively after suffering injuries
